alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 7:14AM EDT until May 25 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Escambia County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Conecuh County in south central Alabama... North central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 614 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jay, or 8 miles south of Brewton, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brewton, East Brewton, Castleberry, Jay, Pollard and Riverview. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
